languages.text: {n}Губернатор Драйвстем тихо и угрожающе шипит:{/n} "Девочка, если ты думаешь, что тебе разрешено обсуждать приказы {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}, то вашей семье слишком долго разрешали жить в вольности".

traits.locale_text: {n}Губернатор Драйвстем тихо и угрожающе шипит:{/n} "Девочка, если ты думаешь, что тебе разрешено обсуждать приказы Вольного Торговца, то вашей семье слишком долго разрешали жить в вольности".

languages.text: {n}Governor Drivestem hisses quietly and menacingly,{/n} "If you think, girl, that you are entitled to dispute the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s orders, then your family has been allowed to live in liberty for too long."
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор Драйвстем тихо и угрожающе шипит:{/n} "Девочка, если ты думаешь, что тебе разрешено обсуждать приказы {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}, то вашей семье слишком долго разрешали жить в вольности".

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend hisses quietly and menacingly,{/n} "If you think, girl, that you are entitled to discuss the Rogue Trader's orders, then your family has been allowed to live in liberty for too long."
{n}Urbend hisses quietly and menacingly,{/n} "If you think, girl, that you are entitled to discuss the Rogue Trader's orders, then your family has been allowed to live in liberty for too long."

{n}Governor Drivestem hisses quietly and menacingly,{/n} "If you think, girl, that you are entitled to dispute the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s orders, then your family has been allowed to live in liberty for too long."

{n}Governor Drivestem hisses quietly and menacingly,{/n} "If you think, girl, that you are entitled to dispute the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s orders, then your family has been allowed to live in liberty for too long."

{n}Governor Drivestem hisses quietly and menacingly,{/n} "If you think, girl, that you are entitled to dispute the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s orders, then your family has been allowed to live in liberty for too long."

languages.text: {n}ドライブステム総督はシーッと息を漏らして静かに威圧する。{/n}「お嬢さん、もし自分には{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の命令に異を唱える資格があるとお考えなら、ウェルザリアン一族はあまりにも長く自由に振る舞いすぎていたようですな」
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Drivestem hisses quietly and menacingly,{/n} "If you think, girl, that you are entitled to dispute the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s orders, then your family has been allowed to live in liberty for too long."

traits.locale_text: {n}ドライブステム総督はシーッと息を漏らして静かに威圧する。{/n}「お嬢さん、もし自分には{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の命令に異を唱える資格があるとお考えなら、ウェルザリアン一族はあまりにも長く自由に振る舞いすぎていたようですな」

languages.text: {n}德莱夫斯塔总督气势汹汹地低声嘶吼道。{/n}“小姑娘，如果你以为你有资格对{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的命令提出异议，那看得出来，你的家族确实已经自由散漫得太久了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Drivestem hisses quietly and menacingly,{/n} "If you think, girl, that you are entitled to dispute the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s orders, then your family has been allowed to live in liberty for too long."

traits.locale_text: {n}德莱夫斯塔总督气势汹汹地低声嘶吼道。{/n}“小姑娘，如果你以为你有资格对{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的命令提出异议，那看得出来，你的家族确实已经自由散漫得太久了。”

languages.text: {n}El gobernador Drivestem sisea, amenazador:{/n} «Muchacha, si crees que tienes derecho a disputar las órdenes de{mf|l| la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}, es que tu familia ha vivido en libertad demasiado tiempo».
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Drivestem hisses quietly and menacingly,{/n} "If you think, girl, that you are entitled to dispute the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s orders, then your family has been allowed to live in liberty for too long."

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador Drivestem sisea, amenazador:{/n} «Muchacha, si crees que tienes derecho a disputar las órdenes de{mf|l| la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}, es que tu familia ha vivido en libertad demasiado tiempo».

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur Drivestem lui répond sur un ton menaçant :{/n} « Jeune fille, si vous pensez avoir le droit de contester les ordres {mf|du|de la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} en toute impunité, c'est que votre famille vit en liberté depuis bien trop longtemps. »
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Drivestem hisses quietly and menacingly,{/n} "If you think, girl, that you are entitled to dispute the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s orders, then your family has been allowed to live in liberty for too long."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur Drivestem lui répond sur un ton menaçant :{/n} « Jeune fille, si vous pensez avoir le droit de contester les ordres {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} en toute impunité, c'est que votre famille vit en liberté depuis bien trop longtemps. »

languages.text: {n}Gouverneur Drivestem zischt leise und bedrohlich:{/n} "Mädchen, wenn Ihr denkt, es stünde Euch zu, die Befehle {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}{/g} anzuzweifeln, dann hat Eure Familie zu lange zu viele Freiheiten genossen."
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Drivestem hisses quietly and menacingly,{/n} "If you think, girl, that you are entitled to dispute the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s orders, then your family has been allowed to live in liberty for too long."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gouverneur Drivestem zischt leise und bedrohlich:{/n} "Mädchen, wenn Ihr denkt, es stünde Euch zu, die Befehle {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} anzuzweifeln, dann hat Eure Familie zu lange zu viele Freiheiten genossen."

languages.text: {n}Vali Drivestem, sessizce ve tehditkârca tıslıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'in{/g} emirlerini sorgulamaya hakkın var sanıyorsan bunca özgürlük ailene fazla gelmiş demektir."
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Drivestem hisses quietly and menacingly,{/n} "If you think, girl, that you are entitled to dispute the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}'s orders, then your family has been allowed to live in liberty for too long."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali Drivestem, sessizce ve tehditkâr bir şekilde tıslıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'in emirlerini sorgulamaya hakkın var sanıyorsan, o hâlde ailene bu kadar özgürlük fazla gelmiş demektir."
